xml.data:
Home » 28Mi Milindapañhapāḷi » 7 Opammakathāpañha » 7.1 Gadrabhavagga
7.1.8 Cāpaṅgapañha
Opammakathāpañha
Gadrabhavagga
Cāpaṅgapañha
232.
1693“Bhante nāgasena, ‘cāpassa ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabban’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamaṃ taṃ ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabban”ti? “Yathā, mahārāja, cāpo sutacchito namito yāvaggamūlaṃ samakameva anunamati nappaṭitthambhati; evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena theranavamajjhimasamakesu anunamitabbaṃ nappaṭipharitabbaṃ. Idaṃ, mahārāja, cāpassa ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ. Bhāsitampetaṃ, mahārāja, bhagavatā devātidevena vidhura (puṇṇaka) jātake— 
1694
‘Cāpovūnudaro dhīro,
vaṃso vāpi pakampaye;
Paṭilomaṃ na vatteyya,
sa rājavasatiṃ vase’”ti.
1695Cāpaṅgapañho aṭṭhamo.
<< 7.1.7 Vaṃsaṅgapañhaup7.1.9 Vāyasaṅgapañha >>
